column5: Will be fishing Vaughn Lake area of Lac Seul 7/6-7/13. Looking for any recent fishing reports. I'm assuming road conditions are now fine between Fort Frances and Dryden. Any reports would be appreciated. Thanks, JohnH
Try http://www.justfishontario.com/reports.htm and check out Silver Water Wheel Lodge They fish Vaughn and do a fishing report every week. Great detailed reports. Known for big fish lodge.

Actually Silver Water Wheel Lodge has an outpost on Vaughn Lake but they don't fish the lake from the main lodge. They have a tremendous fishery within minutes of the lodge so there is little if any need to travel 60+ minutes to Vaughn. We just returned from there and caught tons of HUGE walleye.
